body:
Comment 3: 
the docs of Scanln:
func Scanln(a ...interface{}) (n int, err error)
    Scanln is similar to Scan, but stops scanning at a newline and after the
    final item there must be a newline or EOF.

Note: the part after the "and".

in your example, s is the last item, so after scanning s, there must be a
newline or EOF, so you received an error stating a newline is expected.
